DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect red ginseng consumption blood pressure ( BP ) fast plasma metabolomes .
DOC.brief_title: Blood Pressure Lowering Effect Supplementation With Korea Red Ginseng Associated With Reductions Circulating Lp-PLA2 Activity Lysophospatidylcholines Increase Dihydrobiopterin Prehypertensive Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: A randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled study conduct nonobese , nondiabetic prehypertensive subject . Over 12 week test period , red ginseng group ( n=31 ) consume 10 capsule ( total 5g ) daily contain red ginseng , placebo group ( n=31 ) consume product without red ginseng . Fasting plasma metabolomes profile use UPLC-LTQ-Orbitrap mass spectrometry .
DOC.criteria: nondiabetic , nonobese prehypertensive subject blood pressure range 120 139 mmHg ( systolic ) 8089 mmHg ( diastolic ) enrol study . exclusion criterion include previous diagnosed clinical hypertension selfreported use antihypertensive medication abnormal liver renal function history cardiovascular disease kidney disease cancer thyroid pituitary disease serious lifethreatening illness require regular medical treatment also exclude woman pregnant , breast feeding intend become pregnant time study .
